message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it offers exceptional value, even at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price.  I could meet you halfway at $16,000, but that's my best offer.
I appreciate your response, Alice. I'm still not able to meet at $16,000. My maximum would be $14,000.
